name: Lofi Room
description:
Find the 7 instruments and complete the lofi hip-hop beat.

Click on the hidden objects and use the Q, W, E, R keys to build the beat!

A hidden object and rhythm game made for Music Game Jam 2018

(P.S. There is a bug where the first note may reset prematurely. try and hit the it a little later, or hit it early on the way back around. I'll try and come up with a fix for this)
